name: diffx
description: When key ordering changes, traditional diff shows every line as changed. diffx understands structure and shows what actually changed.

og.title: diffx
og.description: Semantic diff tool for structured data

features.title: Semantic Comparison
features.description: Ignores key order and whitespace. Shows only real value changes with +/-/~ symbols.

features.title: 6 Formats
features.description: JSON, YAML, TOML, XML, INI, CSV. Auto-detects from file extension.

features.title: Array ID Keys
features.description: --array-id-key identifies array elements by a specific key. Correctly detects reordering.

features.title: Directory Comparison
features.description: -r for recursive comparison. Perfect for diffing config files across directories.

features.title: JSON/YAML Output
features.description: --output json/yaml for machine-readable output. Integrates into CI/CD pipelines.
